comments.author: wls220spring@gmail.com
comments.text:
Select an email in the Thread Pane.
Select File > Print Preview from the Menu bar, or Print > Print Preview from the Menu button.
Click the "Print" button in the dialog window.

The email doesn't print.

The email should print.

The [release notes](https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/77.0beta/releasenotes/) indicate that "Print progress dialog is disabled" is an **Unresolved Issue**. It doesn't look disabled in the Config Editor.

Toggling  "print.show_print_progress" to "false" fixes the issue and emails print.

Calendar printing works with "print.show_print_progress" set to "true" or "false"
comments.raw_text:
Select an email in the Thread Pane.
Select File > Print Preview from the Menu bar, or Print > Print Preview from the Menu button.
Click the "Print" button in the dialog window.

The email doesn't print.

The email should print.

The [release notes](https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/77.0beta/releasenotes/) indicate that "Print progress dialog is disabled" is an **Unresolved Issue**. It doesn't look disabled in the Config Editor.

Toggling  "print.show_print_progress" to "false" fixes the issue and emails print.

Calendar printing works with "print.show_print_progress" set to "true" or "false"
comments.creator: wls220spring@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
Still not working properly in 77.0b3.

Using just Print from the Menu bar or Menu button > Print > Print does work.
